long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Numeric grades for online game popmundo.com

* Display numerical values instead of text values
* Display numerical values over progress bars
* Show unread notifications on title bar
* Show desktop notifications


Source: https://github.com/behcet/numericgrades
